law.catch_line: Each fiscal year, each county shall pay to each incorporated municipality therein, an amount of mone...
law.text: Each fiscal year, each county shall pay to each incorporated municipality therein, an amount of money equal to the amount received for fiscal 1967-68 by such municipality under § 30(d) of former Article 81 of the Code of Maryland, relating to apportionment of shares taxes on banks and finance corporations.
